transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Nahi nahi baat nahi
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan hello haan Priyanshu ke sath sir abhi baat kijiye aap inse please theek hai
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji namaste Sunil sahab
Customer: Hello namaskar ji
Executive: Haan namaskar sir ji Priyanshu bol raha tha sir kaise hain sir aapko renewal ka samay yaad aata hai kya
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai sir meri to baat hoti thi account wo bhi bataiye sir pichli baar aapne mere ko 4 lakh rupye dubo diya hai hum phone karte reh gaye is mahine ho jayega acha is mahine aawaz aayega ye kar lete hain wo kar lete hain
Executive: Ji sir
Customer: Fir aap teesre aadmi ko phone kar rahe the renewal karne kya matlab kya company ka
Executive: Nahi nahi Vishnu sahab account kya tha account department changes hue the na
Customer: Wo department changes hue the to account transfer ho gaya tha nahi to main to har mahine aapke sath discuss karta tha video meeting
Customer: Mat sikhaya karo kya hota hai kya nahi hota hai
Customer: Mat sikhaya karo ye ye jo formality wale kaam hai na ye baatein mat kiya karo kaam ki baat karo ki ye cheeze hoti hai
Executive: Nahi hai Vishnu sir aapko pata hai meri to baat aapse hoti rehti thi jab tak bhi account tha hum video meeting karte the
Customer: Ho gaya fir kya ho gaya ho gaya kya mujhe batao mera 4 lakh rupya mujhe kya mila ye batao mujhe baki chhodo baat baat karne se kaun sa ped ho gaya teen mahine se ek baar aap baat karte to kaun sa bada kaam kar liya
Executive: Nahi nahi sir main har mahine aapka report discuss karta tha jab tak main dekh raha tha sir inquiry
Customer: Nikal detail meri
Executive: Sir aap boliye main bhejunga jab tak mere paas account tha tab tak hum barabar discuss karte the video meeting har mahine lagbhag hoti thi hamari ek baar
Customer: Last mein jab hamari baat hui thi ji sir
Executive: Kya baat hui thi yaar aapko kya bolu main aapko
Customer: Wahi usme usme ye nahi Vishnu sahab yahi issue tha ki inquiry to badi thi calls bhi badi thi par detail ka issue jyada aa raha tha aapne jo mujhe bataya hua tha
Executive: Usme detail kam hai jyada tha but ye tha ki inquiry wagera mein
Customer: Mujhe aap apne phone se baat kijiye mujhe 3 baje baat karni hai
Executive: Theek hai sir main apne apne se baat kar lunga
Customer: Phone nahi karega aap hi baat karoge mujhe aap se hi baat karni hai kisi se dusre phone nahi karna
Executive: Ji sir
Customer: Ji ji baat hai koi bhi aadmi
Executive: Koi nahi main baat kar lunga sir
Customer: Ji sir main baat kar lunga aapse
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's 4 lakh rupees were not fruitful.

- Wants to know what he got for his money.
- Wants to discuss details and not formalities.
- Wants to talk to the same executive.


Resolution:

- Executive explained about department changes.

- Executive assured he will call back at 3 PM.


Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, inquiry, account, details
